snippet.title: Kotlin Messenger 07: Loading User Profile Images in Chat Log
snippet.description:
Learn how to load images for each row message inside our Chat Log Activity screen.  Furthermore, we'll fix the issue where we have two launcher activities in the App Drawer. Enjoy.

Podcasts Course
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/Podcasts
